noUpdates: No updates available for this year

features: Added new raids: Colossus Ira Omega (Impossible) and Celeste Ater Omega (Impossible)
Pendulum of Extremity, Pendulum of Sagacity, and Pendulum of Supremacy added (I kept forgetting about these)
Only Dark Opus Weapons at Transcendence Lv3 or higher can equip the new Pendulums
Fixed a bug where users could not set the awakening level on some Grand weapons
Added new raids: Tiamat Aura Omega (Impossible) and Luminiera Credo Omega (Impossible)
When searching for characters, weapons, and summons, results will now show the item can be transcended
When searching for summons, results will now show whether the summon has a subaura
Added new class: Onmyoji
Fixed a bug that prevented filtering job skills by category
Fixed a bug that prevented infinite scrolling in search results
Added Ultimate Mastery skills for classes: Cavalier, Relic Buster, Yamato, and Masquerade
Fixed a bug where Telumas could be set on the third slot of Draconic Providence weapons
Fixed a bug that prevented logged out users from creating teams if they started from the Character or Summon tabs
Fixed a bug that prevented filtering the Teams, Saved, and Profile pages without selecting a filter twice

Sorry for the longer spaces between updates—life has been a bit busy. Work has gotten a lot busier, I have more social obligations, and am working on another app. I haven't abandoned granblue.team though. Thanks for your patience!
Finally fixed the logic that determines when a conflict occurs between Dark Opus Weapons, Draconic Weapons and Draconic Providence Weapons
Added Ultimate Mastery skills for classes: Bandit Tycoon, Nighthound, Monk, and Rising Force
Draconic Weapons Providence are not properly implemented yet and cannot be placed into teams with Dark Opus Weapons
Added Ultimate Mastery skills for classes: Warlock, Chrysaor, Lumberjack, Robin Hood, and Doctor
Added new Manatura "Ouroboros Mino"

bugs: Class accessory popover has been fixed, so Paladin shields and Manadiver manatura can be selected again
The AX skill section no longer shows up in the weapon hovercard if no AX skills are set
The top of the character hovercard has been slightly refined
Fixed a bug that prevented all character over mastery (ring) bonuses from being displayed
Fixed a bug that reset a character's transcendence level if their mastery values are set
Fixed a bug that prevented setting the value for Rupee Gain or EXP Gain AX skills on weapons

v1_2_0.notes:
I'm very bad at writing actual release notes, so this is a consolidation of the bigger features released in the last six months. Don't worry: there's some new stuff here too!
The next features (in no particular order) will be: a way to define roles and substitutions for characters, a collection tracker and hopefully making progress on guides. That's a lot, but I'll chip away at it bit by bit.
As always, if you have any feedback, feel free to reach out in the granblue-tools Discord. Thanks for using granblue.team!

features.title: Take a peek into teams
features.blurb: Hover over the bottom of a team to see the characters and summons without opening it.

features.title: New team navigation
features.blurb: You can also peek into all the views of a team with the new design at the top of the teams page.

features.title: Control who can see your team
features.blurb: You can now set teams to be public, private, or only visible to people with the link.

features.title: Rich text editing
features.blurb: Now you can use rich text when writing team descriptions. Add bold, italics, links, and more!

features.title: Mentions
features.blurb: You can also link to individual items in your descriptions. Type @ followed by the name of the item.

features.title: Inclusion and Exclusion
features.blurb: Sick of seeing Ereshkigal? Now you can filter teams by which items appear—or don't appear—in them.

features.title: Redesigned battle selection
features.blurb: Battle selection has been revamped. Search for a battle by name, or filter by whether it's solo, a raid, or event-based.

features.title: Search views
features.blurb: Now you can choose to see either recently used items or the newest items when adding weapons and summons

features.title: Quick summons
features.blurb: Specify which summon is set as the quick summon and specify auto-summon settings in Battle settings.

features.title: Grand awakenings
features.blurb: Now you can set which Grand weapons you spent cages on for a little extra power.

features: Added new class "Street King"
A large update is in the works. Stay tuned!
Added Ultimate Mastery skills for classes: Sage, Chaos Ruler, Elysian, Glorybringer, Runeslayer
Added new weapon series, World Series
Added Siete HL (raid)
Chaser name corrected (was 'Chase')
Added new class "Yamato"
Added Ultimate Mastery skills for classes: Berserker, Apsaras, Nekomancer, Kengo
Added raids for Dread Barrage
Renamed "Guild Wars" in raid list to "Unite and Fight"
Fixed sorting of raids for Dread Barrage and Unite and Fight
Fixed character hovercard showing up behind class image
Fixed an issue where users couldn't edit remixed teams
Added official names for Proven Weapons and Revans Weapons

features.title: Remix parties
features.blurb: See a team you want to try but don't have Yatima? Now you can remix teams from other users to showcase substitutes, swap for items you have, or just give it your own flavor.

features.title: Accountless team editing
features.blurb: Now you can edit parties you create later on, even if you don't make an account. You still won't have a profile, so make sure to bookmark them!

features.title: Transcendence
features.blurb: Now you can set the transcendence stage for Eternals and select summons (namely, Bahamut).

features.title: Shields and Manatura
features.blurb: When using Paladin or Manadiver, you can set their respective Shield or Manatura from the button next to the main character.

features.title: Character Mastery
features.blurb: You can now add individual values for your character's rings, earrings, and awakenings. Make sure to set your Perpetuity Rings!

features.title: Updated team mechanics
features.blurb: Sorry, each party is only big enough for one Beelzebub.

features.title: R Characters
features.blurb: R Characters have been added to the database for your mem—Proving Grounds compositions.

features.title: Unique URLs for team tabs
features.blurb: You can now link to individual tabs directly. The site will do it for you when you copy a URL, or you can append /characters, /weapons or /summons manually.

features.title: Redesigned navigation
features.blurb: The top-navigation has been slightly redesigned. Click the party name to copy its URL!

features.title: Update toasts
features.blurb: The site will now show an update in the bottom-right corner when new features or content is added.

bugs: Fixed a bug that caused users to be logged out whenever they restarted their browser
Fixed a bug that caused Dark Opus weapons to permanently disappear when adding them to a party that already had one
Rebuilt the component for Clear Time in party details to have a more predictable user experience
Fixed a bug that made it so you could not set Row IV EMP skills in Row V

features: Extra party fields: Full Auto, Clear Time, and more
Support for Youtube short URLs
Responsive grids and lots of other mobile fixes
Many other bug fixes
First release!
You can embed Youtube videos now
Better click behavior: right-click to open in a new tab
Manually set dark mode in Account Settings
Lots of bugs squashed
